questions.question_text: "accountability" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: Responsibility for explaining or justifying actions
questions.example_sentence: The new review system was designed to strengthen accountability in document approvals.
questions.explanation:
説明責任
業務削減
任意指針
報奨制度

questions.question_text: "facilitate" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: To make a process easier or smoother
questions.example_sentence: The tracking system will facilitate communication between reviewers.
questions.explanation:
円滑にする
却下する
遅らせる
責任を課す

questions.question_text: "expedited" の意味はどれでしょう？
questions.example_sentence: Time-sensitive materials may qualify for expedited review.
questions.explanation:
迅速な
記録された
公表された
繰り返された

questions.question_text: "transparency" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: Openness and ease of understanding processes
questions.example_sentence: The shared system was introduced to increase transparency in approvals.
questions.explanation:
透明性
機密性
デザイン統一
収益性

questions.question_text: "guideline" の意味はどれでしょう？
questions.example_sentence: Employees should review the guidelines before submitting documents.
questions.explanation:
指針・ガイドライン
法的契約
苦情
評価点
